description: The first appearance of Black Panther! On a mission in the remote wilderness of Wakanda, the Fantastic Four encounter one of Marvel’s most iconic heroes. But how are the Inhumans involved in this earthly encounter? The FF bested in battle by the Black Panther!In the jungles of Africa the Fantastic Four are called by the king of the Wakandas, only to test the power of the Black Panther.This is the first appearance of the Black Panther.
name: Introducing the Sensational Black Panther
